entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
